rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall near the main door with built-in seating area.
Large living room adjacent to kitchen and dining area; designed in Colonial style.
Adjacent to the living room with direct access to the terrace or garden.
Fully equipped kitchen with colonial features including traditional stone accents.
Smaller guest bath located near the entrance or corridor for visitors.
Dedicated home office space in a quiet corner of the living area with Vastu guidelines ensuring it faces north-east.

openings.location: Corner plot frontage, facing north for positive Vastu flow.

openings.description: Open to south-west corner for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with attached ensuite bathroom and a walk-in closet, facing east for auspicious energy.
Additional bedroom designed in Colonial style, facing south-east to harness sunlight and positive energy.
Room intended for children with ample natural light, placed towards the west per Vastu guidelines.

openings.location: Adjacent to bedrooms for fresh air and scenic view.
